statements: SELECT user_id, last_activity, engagement_score FROM user_churn;
SELECT * FROM user_churn WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, subscription_status FROM user_churn ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications FROM user_churn WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT engagement_score, last_activity FROM user_churn WHERE email_notifications = TRUE AND subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, last_activity FROM user_churn WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, email_notifications FROM user_churn WHERE subscription_status = 'Active' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_churn WHERE subscription_status = 'Cancelled' AND last_activity BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28' ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, email_notifications FROM user_churn WHERE last_activity < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, last_activity, subscription_status FROM user_churn WHERE email_notifications = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_date FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_date FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE churn_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, MAX(last_activity) AS last_active_date FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, ui.interaction_type, ui.interaction_date FROM users u JOIN user_interaction ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ui.interaction_result = 'successful';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, last_activity FROM users WHERE churn_status = true;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ui.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN user_interaction ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ua.activity_type = 'login' AND ui.interaction_result = 'success';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_created_at FROM users WHERE account_created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.user_id, a.activity_type, a.activity_timestamp, u.username FROM user_activity AS a INNER JOIN users AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, last_login FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, account_created_at FROM users ORDER BY account_created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type FROM users AS u INNER JOIN user_activity AS ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.churn_probability FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN churn_prediction AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY c.prediction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, last_activity FROM users WHERE last_activity < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_activity ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, join_date FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT lp.log_id, u.username, lp.log_date, lp.activity_type FROM user_logs lp JOIN users u ON lp.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, cp.prediction_date, cp.accuracy FROM churn_prediction cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.accuracy > 0.8;
